entry.title: WIND WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:01 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:56 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 80 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
